page.title: 02TARBERT GAZETTEER continued
page.content: a masonic hall and two churches.The only four year secondary school on harris,Sir Edward Scott School,is situated in Tarbert.The usual range of social services are available_doctor and dentist surgeries,old people's home and sheltered housing.Emergency services include fire,police,ambulance and coastguard. Most of the working people are employed in the service industries,the professions,the tweed industry and tourism.Fish-farming is a recent innovation,together with some craft industries_ e.g shell craft,wood turning_closely related to tourism. Tarbert was a fishing port of some significance in the past,but now serves as a refuelling point for ships.However,there are several lobster,prawn and clam fishers.
